about_the_game: Fertility, Crime, and Economy will be a survival strategy game. In the game, you will serve as the governor of Alva Province, striving to increase the precarious birthrate by implementing various policies, while also balancing with reducing crime rates and promoting economic development. Will you choose to take risks of financial and ethical deficits to drive technological advancement, adopt policies to influence public opinion gradually, or enforce strict regulations, such as - banning abortions?

content_descriptors.notes: Text and image content may include (but is not limited to) sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, self-harm, violence, illegal activity, and general immoral behavior.

detailed_description: Fertility, Crime, and Economy will be a survival strategy game. In the game, you will serve as the governor of Alva Province, striving to increase the precarious birthrate by implementing various policies, while also balancing with reducing crime rates and promoting economic development. Will you choose to take risks of financial and ethical deficits to drive technological advancement, adopt policies to influence public opinion gradually, or enforce strict regulations, such as - banning abortions?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX Mountain Lion (10.8)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Fertility, Crime, and Economy is a political game with rouge-lite elements. Be the governor of the Province of Alva, improve the birth rate, decrease the crime rate, and improve the economic development by applying different policies to the society. Be careful, there might be consequences.
